title: My Pixel is stuck in a mode that makes it unusable
content:
I have no idea how I entered it but there is a robot voice that comments on everything I touch and a green square around everything I touch. When I restart my phone it won't go away. It is ridiculously infuriating.

edit: I found out it's something called Talk Back Accessibility Function and got rid of it by holding both the up and down volume buttons. What a terrible function.
